channel.title: Tanghi Argentini on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Tanghi Argentini on Simba Tango

item.title: Great tango shorts
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: None of these are exactly new, but Tanghi Argentini just became available on youtube about a week ago, thanks a lot to Janis for the tip! Nominated for the Academy Awards 2008 for best live action short: And this animated one is not so light hearted, but no less romantic:
